name: Ape vs Caveman Free
description:
Introducing... Caveman! Caveman looking for Stonehenge. Caveman like Stonehenge. But caveman no like evil monkey, sticky cactus, bad bird, pointy rhino or falling rocks! These things bad. Help Caveman reach Stonehenge and advance to the next level.

A classic favorite, in new glorious 3D! Caveman must jump over falling rocks that are hurrled down on him by a giant ape. Luckily, there are other jungle animals willing to help!

This incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics with a classic retro feel.

Ape vs Caveman Free edition features 10 full levels to play!

Features:

* 10 prehistoric levels
* Retro arcade action
* High-score table
* Super addicting game-play
* Cool jungly soundtrack
* Evil Monkeys

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
